meaningMnemonic: When what you <kanji>expose</kanji> is <kanji>exit</kanji>ed out of hiding, exposed for everything to see... that is <vocabulary>exposure</vocabulary>. It can also refer to <vocabulary>photographic exposure</vocabulary> too, in case you were wondering.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
